user.title: Connect to S7 PLC
user.description: Enter your S7 PLC connection details. Default port: {default_port}, rack: {default_rack}, slot: {default_slot}, scan: {default_scan}s, timeout: {default_timeout}s, retries: {default_retries}, backoff: {default_backoff_initial}-{default_backoff_max}s. A connection test will run before saving.

data_description.name: A friendly name for the PLC (used in entity names).
data_description.host: IP or hostname of the PLC.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the PLC, in seconds. Use decimal values for millisecond precision.
data_description.operation_timeout: Maximum duration for a single read/write cycle before retrying.
data_description.max_retries: How many times to retry a failed PLC operation before giving up.
data_description.retry_backoff_initial: Delay before the first retry attempt.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the PLC. Check host, rack, slot, port, and network.

init.title: S7 PLC Options
init.description: Choose what you want to do.

remove.title: Remove Items
remove.description: Select the items you want to remove from this PLC configuration.

data_description.remove_items: Checked items will be removed. The integration will reload to apply the changes.

connection.title: Edit PLC Connection
connection.description: Update the PLC host, rack, slot, and communication timing parameters. A connection test will run before saving.

data_description.name: A friendly name for the PLC (used in entity names).
data_description.host: IP or hostname of the PLC.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the PLC, in seconds. Use decimal values for millisecond precision.
data_description.operation_timeout: Maximum duration for a single read/write cycle before retrying.
data_description.max_retries: How many times to retry a failed PLC operation before giving up.
data_description.retry_backoff_initial: Delay before the first retry attempt.

sensors.title: Add Sensor
sensors.description: Create a sensor that reads a value from the PLC (e.g., DB, MW, etc.). Provide the address and optionally a name.

data_description.address: PLC address to read (e.g., DB1000,DBD0, MW10, DB1,DBW2).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the sensor.
data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class to refine the UI/behavior (e.g., battery, power).
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more sensors.

binary_sensors.title: Add Binary Sensor
binary_sensors.description: Create a binary sensor (on/off) from the PLC. Set the address, name, and optional device_class.

data_description.address: PLC boolean address (e.g., I0.0, Q1.3, DB10,DBX0.1).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the binary sensor.
data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class to refine the UI/behavior (e.g., door, window, power).
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more binary sensors.

switches.title: Add Switch
switches.description: Create a switch with a state address and an optional command address. You can enable state synchronization.

data_description.state_address: PLC address to read the current state (e.g., Q0.0, DB20,DBX0.0).
data_description.command_address: PLC address to write commands (optional). If omitted, only state will be read.
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the switch.
data_description.sync_state: When enabled, the entity state is periodically synchronized from the PLC.
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more switches.

buttons.title: Add Button
buttons.description: Create a stateless button that pulses a PLC boolean address for the configured number of seconds when pressed.

data_description.address: PLC boolean address to pulse (e.g., Q0.0, DB1,DBX0.1).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the button.
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more buttons.
data_description.button_pulse: Duration of the pulse in seconds.

lights.title: Add Light
lights.description: Configure a light with a state address and an optional command address. You can enable state synchronization.

data_description.state_address: PLC address to read the current light state.
data_description.command_address: PLC address to write light commands (optional).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the light.
data_description.sync_state: When enabled, the entity state is periodically synchronized from the PLC.
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more lights.

numbers.title: Add Number
numbers.description: Create a number entity that reads a value from the PLC and can optionally write commands back.

data_description.address: PLC address to read the numeric value (e.g., DB1,DBD0, DB2,DBW4).
data_description.command_address: PLC address to write values (optional). If omitted, the state address is used.
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the number entity.
data_description.min_value: Optional minimum bound for the value shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.max_value: Optional maximum bound for the value shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.step: Optional increment used when adjusting the value in the UI.
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more number entities.

edit.title: Edit Items
edit.description: Select the item you want to modify.

data_description.edit_item: Choose an existing entity to update.

edit_sensor.title: Edit Sensor
edit_sensor.description: Update the address, name, or device class for this sensor.

data_description.address: PLC address to read (e.g., DB1000,DBD0, MW10, DB1,DBW2).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the sensor.
data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class to refine the UI/behavior (e.g., battery, power).

edit_binary_sensor.title: Edit Binary Sensor
edit_binary_sensor.description: Update the address, name, or device class for this binary sensor.

data_description.address: PLC boolean address (e.g., I0.0, Q1.3, DB10,DBX0.1).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the binary sensor.
data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class to refine the UI/behavior (e.g., door, window, power).

edit_switch.title: Edit Switch
edit_switch.description: Update the state address, command address, name, or sync option for this switch.

data_description.state_address: PLC address to read the current state (e.g., Q0.0, DB20,DBX0.0).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the switch.
data_description.sync_state: When enabled, the entity state is periodically synchronized from the PLC.

edit_button.title: Edit Button
edit_button.description: Update the address, name, or pulse duration for this button.

data_description.address: PLC boolean address to pulse (e.g., Q0.0, DB1,DBX0.1).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the button.
data_description.button_pulse: Duration of the pulse in seconds.

edit_light.title: Edit Light
edit_light.description: Update the state address, command address, name, or sync option for this light.

data_description.state_address: PLC address to read the current light state.
data_description.command_address: PLC address to write light commands (optional).
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the light.
data_description.sync_state: When enabled, the entity state is periodically synchronized from the PLC.

edit_number.title: Edit Number
edit_number.description: Update the state address, command address, name, minimum value, maximum value, or step for this number.

data_description.address: PLC address to read the numeric value (e.g., DB1,DBD0, DB2,DBW4).
data_description.command_address: PLC address to write values (optional). If omitted, the state address is used.
data_description.name: Optional friendly name for the number entity.
data_description.min_value: Optional minimum bound for the value shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.max_value: Optional maximum bound for the value shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.step: Optional increment used when adjusting the value in the UI.
data_description.add_another: Stay on this step to add more number entities.

error.no_items: There are no configured items to edit.
